com.microsoft.azure.management.datalake.store.uploader

Class UploadMetadataGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.management.datalake.store.uploader.UploadMetadataGenerator

  • public class UploadMetadataGenerator
extends Object
    An internally used class for generating the metadata used for upload.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UploadMetadataGenerator(UploadParameters parameters)
      Creates a new instance of the UploadMetadataGenerator with the given parameters and the default maximum append length.
      UploadMetadataGenerator(UploadParameters parameters, int maxAppendLength)
      Creates a new instance of the UploadMetadataGenerator with the given parameters and the given maximum append length.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UploadMetadata createNewMetadata(String metadataFilePath)
      Creates a new metadata based on the given input parameters, and saves it to its canonical location.
      UploadMetadata getExistingMetadata(String metadataFilePath)
      Attempts to load the metadata from an existing file in its canonical location.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UploadMetadataGenerator

        public UploadMetadataGenerator(UploadParameters parameters)
        Creates a new instance of the UploadMetadataGenerator with the given parameters and the default maximum append length.
        Parameters:
        parameters - The parameters.

      • UploadMetadataGenerator

        public UploadMetadataGenerator(UploadParameters parameters,
                               int maxAppendLength)
        Creates a new instance of the UploadMetadataGenerator with the given parameters and the given maximum append length.
        Parameters:
        parameters - The parameters
        maxAppendLength - The maximum allowed append length when uploading a file.

    • Method Detail

      • getExistingMetadata

        public UploadMetadata getExistingMetadata(String metadataFilePath)
                                   throws FileNotFoundException,
                                          InvalidMetadataException
        Attempts to load the metadata from an existing file in its canonical location.
        Parameters:
        metadataFilePath - The metadata file path.
        Returns:
        The deserialized UploadMetadata from the specified file path.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - Thrown if the specified metadataFilePath is invalid.
        InvalidMetadataException - Thrown if the metadata itself is invalid.

      • createNewMetadata

        public UploadMetadata createNewMetadata(String metadataFilePath)
                                 throws IOException,
                                        UploadFailedException,
                                        InvalidMetadataException
        Creates a new metadata based on the given input parameters, and saves it to its canonical location.
        Parameters:
        metadataFilePath - Where the serialized metadata will be saved
        Returns:
        A new UploadMetadata object.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if there is an issue saving the metadata to disk.
        UploadFailedException - Thrown if there is an issue aligning the segment record boundaries
        InvalidMetadataException - Thrown if the metadata is invalid.
